about_the_game:
Sweet Glassirl - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with the theme of girls with glasses. It tells the daily life of five girls with glasses of different identities, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

- The game has three difficulty levels: 2x2, 2x4, 4x4 puzzles

- Press "F" to turn on black and white when doing puzzle

- Players can complete the puzzle by pressing the 'Blank' key during the game.

- Players can quickly view girl pictures by pressing the AD key, left and right keys or the left and right keys of the mouse in the gallery

* Puzzle image size is 800x960 px

* Gallery image size is 1088x960 px

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity or pornographic content
- Contains female masturbation content
- Clear depiction of male/female reproductive organs
- Not suitable for viewing at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
